label.description: Label that is assigned to this link.

labelTemplate.description: Human-readable name to use to identify this source account when you are viewing data from it in the monitoring account.

linkId.description: ID string that AWS generated as part of the link ARN.

resourceTypes.description: Types of data that the source account shares with the monitoring account.

sinkArn.description: ARN of the sink that is used for this link.

sinkIdentifier.description:
Identifier of the sink to use to create this link.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

sinkIdentifier.description:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Link resources.
